value.stringValue: Vaccination protocol verified by World Economic Forum
Negative COVID-19 test verified by World Economic Forum
This attendee has their health protocols verified by the World Economic Forum. Salesforce will not independently verify this information.

choices.choiceText: VIP (White badge holders/spouses, GREEN accompanying, GREEN media/com, or GREY temporary)

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Attendee Search


Enter your email used for Safety Cloud and click Next

fields.name: spacercomplete
fields.fieldText:
.

.

.

.

fields.name: dispTextComplete
fields.fieldText:
﻿Check In Complete!

A Dreampass was emailed to "{!objAttendee.PersonEmail}". Use this to gain access to all Salesforce Spaces.



Note: this Dreampass will be valid for 36hrs. Please take an onsite PCR test (if you haven't already done so) to extend the Dreampass for the remainder of the event.



﻿

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
New Attendee Info


Please verify your information below:

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
There's a Problem


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Terms and Conditions


Please accept the terms and conditions before continuing

fields.name: q1
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I am at least 18 years old and am: (1) submitting verification form information for myself; or (2) a parent, guardian, or other legal representative authorized to submit verification information on behalf of a minor or other individual(s)

fields.name: q2
fields.fieldText: I agree to receive status updates via email

fields.name: q3
fields.fieldText: I have: (1) read and understand the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Notice; and (2) consent that Salesforce.com (http://salesforce.com/) Inc. may process information regarding my health status, (COVID-19 vaccination status and testing results) to ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees and the community at Davos. I can withdraw my consent at any time.

fields.name: morets
fields.fieldText: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA) or the UK, please note that it may be required to store and process your personal data in a country (for example, the United States) which may not provide for the same level of protection as in the EEA/the UK. Details on how Salesforce processes your personal data and your related rights are set out in the Salesforce Privacy Statement.

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:

There are outstanding protocols required before a Dreampass can be granted. Ask a Salesforce employee to assist in the outstanding items.

fields.name: DispTextStart
fields.fieldText:
﻿Welcome to Davos


If you have a registration QR code, place it in the frame. It will be scanned automatically.

fields.name: noQRText
fields.fieldText: No QR Code? Proceed to manual entry.

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Skip Vaccine Verification?


You cannot check in until your vaccine has been verified. Either skip this for now, or go back to verify vaccination.

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Verify Attendee Info


Please verify information for {!objAttendee.PersonEmail} below:

fields.name: displayPhotoUpload
fields.fieldText:
Upload Profile Picture


Upload a profile picture for {!objAttendee.Name} by clicking Take Photo and then Save Photo. You can skip this step by clicking Skip

fields.name: profilePicSettext
fields.fieldText: Profile picture already set

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Verify Vaccination


Have a Salesforce staff member check your vaccination documents. Click next to continue.
